price: ߤߍ߲߬ ߌߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߬ߝߐ߬ߓߊ߮߸ ߌ ߟߊߥߛߊ߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߋ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߣߵߌ ߟߊߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥasbuka al-lahu wamani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
